name: Drexthar Bloodtwin
aura: Increases Ally ACC in All Battles by 70.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 30% chance of placing an [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 20% of the damage inflicted if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff.
skills.name: Eldritch Flames
skills.books:

Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. This chance increases to 100% if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff. Also places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the [Provoke] debuff is placed.

skills.desc: Has a 55% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns on the attacker when hit. This Champion's RES increases by 10 for every enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff. Stacks up to 50.
